inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: referred with abdominal pain from January 2000 to June 2006

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: surgeon on the pediatric general surgery service at the Health Sciences Centre (HSC)-Children's Hospital in Winnipeg.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Diagnostic laparoscopy revealed phlegmon with no other abdominal abnormalities

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is now a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia

notes: Severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, accompanied by nausea and vomiting. Elevated WBC with dominant neutrophils.
